Jensen JTV1921DC 19″ LED HD TV with Integrated HDTV (ATSC) Tuner, 16:9 LCD Panel, 1366 x 768, 12VDC, 16.7 Million Colors, White LED Illumination, 250 nit Brightness, 9ms Response Time

Jensen made just what you need to upgrade your mobile lounge. This 19″ LED HD TV runs off 12-volt power, giving you a sleek and tidy addition to your boat, RV, custom SUV, or limousine. With plenty of diverse inputs and HD capability, this screen will make the most out of anything you connect to it, whether it’s a Blu-ray player or gaming console. You can wall-mount this monitor, and the built-in speakers will broadcast strong stereo sound. The included remote control lets you control the screen and access the menu

Key Features:
– White LED Illumination
– 16:9 LCD panel, 1366 x 768 FULL HD
– DC Power
– Integrated HDTV (ATSC) Tuner
– Audio Return Channel (ARC) Supported with HDMI
– CEC function with JENSEN CEC-equipped HDMI DVD players
– 16.7 Million Colors

Inputs/Outputs:
– Composite Video Input x 1 (NTSC/PAL compatible)
– Component Video Input x 1 (YPbPr) (Note: Composite/component input shares same I/O)
– Stereo Audio Input x 1
– RF x 1
– USB x 1
– HDMI input x 1
– Selectable (Variable/Fixed) Line Level Audio Output (RCA) x 1
– Digital SPDIF Audio Output (RCA) x 1

Specifications:
– Power System: DC 12 V
– Power Consumption: 20mA stand by/3.17A max
– Maximum Relative Humidity: 85%
– Video / Display System: NTSC/ATSC/PAL
– Video Input Signal (Composite): 1Vp-p @ 75 ohms
– Audio Output: 3W x 2
– Diagonal Size: 18.5″
– Resolution: 1366 x 768
– Brightness: 250 nit
– Contrast Ratio: 3000 : 1
– Display Format: 16:9
– Response Time: 9 ms
– Regulatory Certification(s): FCC
– Overall Dimensions: 17.44″ W x 10.97″ H x 1.84″ D (without stand)
– Product Weight: 5.5 Pounds
DC Power
Audio Return Channel (ARC) Supported with HDMI

Jensen JE1913ACWM Widescreen 19″ Wallmount LCD 100-240V AC Television, specially built for Boats, Yacht, RV Recreational Vehicle, Trailer, Camper, Motor Home etc.
JENSEN…the ONLY Brand of TVs designed, engineered, tested & built exclusively for Over-The-Road Applications.
Enjoy functionality at its best with the JE1913AC. This Flat Panel JENSEN LCD TV boasts all the features you could ask for including an integrated HDTV tuner (1080p, 720p & 480p), 16:9 aspect ratio and high-contrast ratio. Brings home entertainment to the RV and take a quality entertainment experience wherever you go! Mount it on the Wall with a VESA 100mm x 100mm mounting pattern TV Mount. To round out this extensive feature set, the JE1913AC features various inputs and outputs.
Inputs/Outputs

  • Composite video input x 2 (NTSC/PAL)
  • Stereo audio input x 1
  • VGA with 3.5mm audio input x1
  • USB input x 1
  • RF x 1
  • HDMI input x 2
  • Selectable (variable/fixed) line level audio output (RCA) x1
  • IR output
  • SPDIF output
  • Headphone output


Specifications

  • Power System: AC 100-240V, 50/60Hz
  • Power Consumption: 42mA stand by, 2.7A max
  • Operating Temperature Range: -4°F to 149°F -20°C to 65°C
  • Storage Temperature Range: -22°F to 158°F -30°C to 70°C
  • Maximum Relative Humidity: 85%
  • Overall Dimensions: 18.03″ W x 12.08″ H x 2.06″ D
  • Product Weight:11 lbs
  • Regulatory Certification(s): FCC


Performance

  • Video / Display System: NTSC/ATSC/PAL
  • Video Input Signal (Composite): 1Vp-p @ 75 ohms
  • Audio Output: 6W x 2


LCD

  • Diagonal Size: 19″
  • Resolution: 1366 x 768
  • Brightness: 250 nit
  • Contrast Ratio: 1000 : 1
  • View Angles: Top 85°, Bottom 85°, Left 80°, Right 80°
  • Display Format: 16:9
  • Response Time: 3.5 ms

110V AC powered LCD AC Television, specially built for Boats, Yacht, RV Recreational Vehicle, Trailer, Camper, Motor Home etc., White LED illumination, 1366 x 768 full HD, Integrated HDTV (ATSC) tuner (1080p, 720p & 480p)
CEC function with AWM975 or other Jensen CEC-equipped HDMI DVD players (DVD Player Not Included), VESA 100mm x 100mm and 200mm x 400mm mounting pattern, Optional table top stand (STDJE1913) sold separately, Full function wireless remote control included
Convenient front controls, Conformal coated circuit boards, Rugged metal cabinet, Reinforced cabinet structure and mounting points. V-O rated front and rear cabinet materials which meets maximum UL/CUL safety certifications
Composite video input x2 (NTSC/PAL), Stereo audio input x1, VGA with 3.5mm audio input x1, USB input x1, RF x1, HDMI input x2, Selectable (variable/fixed) line level audio output (RCA) x1, IR output x1, SPDIF output x1, Headphone output x1

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $11.99 - $9.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:31:44 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Welcome to write to us if you have any problem.

Premium Material: Won’t scratch your valuable objects when measuring, serve you for years.

Accurate Reading: Strictly tested to ensure exact measurements which accurate to 0.01 inch.

Zero Calibration: Press to set to zero at any position and continue to measure next section.

Unit Conversion: Easy to read in inches and mm by pressing the blue button on the top.

Large LCD Display: Shows instant readings with digital numbers, much more convenient.

Auto On/Off: Auto turns on when sliding, auto turns off after 5mins if with no operation.

4 Ways of Measurement

-External Measuring: Measuring the outer diameter of objects with the long jaws.

-Internal Measuring: Measuring the inner diameter of objects with the top jaws.

-Depth Measuring: Measuring the depth of hard-to-reach small objects with the long probe.

-Step Measuring: Measuring the height/length with its step design.

CAUTION

1. Before first use, please remove the white insulation strip in the battery cover, or the electronic caliper cannot work.

2. The digital caliper is only for household measurement, such as jewelry, gadgets and other household objects.

If for industrial measurement, please buy a more professional and more accurate measuring tool in professional field.

3. If you find the readings are not accurate, please slide the LCD screen to the left end (“0” on the scale), and then press the zero button. Welcome to write to us for more questions.

Specifications:

Material: Carbon Fiber Composites

Size: 9.4 x 3 x 0.6in

Weight: 2oz

Measuring Range: 0-6 inches/0-150mm

Accuracy: ±0.2mm/0.01”

Resolution: 0.01”/0.1mm

Battery: 1.5V LR44 button cell

Package

1 x Digital Caliper + 2 x Batteries

Precise measurement: Measurement range: 0 – 6”/ 0 – 150mm; Resolution: 0.01”/ 0.1mm; Accuracy: ±0.2mm/0.01”. Perfect and accurate caliper measuring tool for household/DIY measurement. Please choose stainless steel digital caliper for more accurate measuring
4 measuring modes: This digital caliper can be used to Measure inside and outside diameter, depth and step with two sets of jaws and a probe. Powered by battery, comes with a pre-installed battery and a spare battery
Inch/mm conversion: One button quick switch between two units: inch and millimeter, definitely save your time. Made of rugged plastic carbon fiber composites, durable and portable
Zero setting function: The smart design allows you to set zero with an easy touch of a button and start a new measurement at any point of the scale, ideal for differential measuring
Large LCD screen & auto off: The large and easy-to-read LCD display helps you get precise results quickly and easily, auto shutdown for saving battery after 5 minutes if without operation

Product Description

Stainless Steel Sliding Roller has a longer lifeThe Part where your thumb touched (Not the Sliding Roller) with concave convex groove design, which feels more comfortable and convenient to use

High-end brushed stainless steel body and precision grinding and polishing process, return to zero smoothly and accurately

The stainless steel screw is corrosion resistance and Anti-rust, which can have a longer life.

The measuring grab is made of high-strength stainless steel and precision grinding technology to ensure accurate and stable caliper measurementPremium stainless steel display case is more durable compare to plastic case.IP54 Splash proof: Water drop and dust resistant. Please dry off digital caliper thoroughly before using, if your digital caliper dropped into the water by accident.

Package Include: 1 x Digital Caliper 1 x Protective Case 3 x Button Cell 1 x Screwdriver

Size
8 Inch /200mm 6 Inch /150mm 6 Inch /150mm 12 Inch/300mm 4.5 inch/305mm

Measuring Range
0-8 inches/0-200mm 0-6 inches/0-150mm 0-6 inches/0-150mm 0-12 inches/0-300mm 0-4.5 inch/0-305mm

Do you want a quick and precise digital caliper? Our 8 inch caliper gives you the certainty you need. It gives you four different ways to find those tricky dimensions, and no longer need to struggle with tiny and inaccurate numbers on your analog caliper or other measuring device.

Product Features

Premium Material

Heavy duty splash proof stainless-steel body, dust protected and splash water resistant.

Accurate Reading

Strictly tested to ensure exact measurements accurate to ±0.001”/0.02 mm.

Zero Calibration

Press to set to zero at any position to measure the next section

Auto Shut-Off

Auto turn-off after about 6 min of inactive operation.

Notice

If you find the readings are not accurate, please slide the LCD screen to the left end (“0” on the scale), and then press the zero button

Specifications

Material: IP54 splash proof Stainless Steel

Size: 12.28 x 4.72 x 1.3 in

Weight: 17.6 oz

Measuring Range: 0-8 inches/0-200 mm

Accuracy:

±0.02mm/0.001” (<100mm)

±0.03mm/0.001” (>100-200mm)

Resolution: 0.01mm/0.0005”

Battery: 3V button cell

【3 Units Conversion】 You can switch 3 units with the calipers: inch, mm and fraction based on your habits with the push of a button. Press the on/off button, slide the digital caliper to anywhere, then you can read the values on the display. And you can reset it to zero by zero button.
【Precise & Accurate】 Kynup 8″ caliper has a measurement range of 0 – 8”/ 0 – 200mm; accuracy to ±0.001”/0.02mm and resolution to 0.0005″/0.01mm. Perfect and accurate caliper measuring tool for household or DIY measurement. Please choose stainless steel digital caliper for more accurate measuring.
【4 Measuring Ways】 Caliper measuring tool comes with two sets of jaws and a probe, which are easy to measure depth, step, external and internal diameter, making all your objects measurable. 3 batteries are provided: one installed and other two as spare batteries
【Splash Proof & Stainless Steel Material】The Splash Proof micrometer is constructed of first-class STAINLESS STEEL, Splash Proof, anti-rust, which has a strong frame with lockable head. The housing is made of metal with silver paint on the surface.
【Wide Application & Auto Off】The 8 inch caliper micrometer is always used by professionals and hobbyists alike, by jewelers, hobbyists, woodworkers, DIY. Auto shutdown for saving battery after within 6 minutes if without operation

Read more

  • Stainless Steel Sliding Roller has a longer life
  • The Part where your thumb touched (Not the Sliding Roller) with concave convex groove design, which feels more comfortable and convenient to use

High-end brushed stainless steel body and precision grinding and polishing process, return to zero smoothly and accurately

The stainless steel screw is corrosion resistance and Anti-rust, which can have a longer life.

Read more

  • The measuring grab is made of high-strength stainless steel and precision grinding technology to ensure accurate and stable caliper measurement
  • Premium stainless steel display case is more durable compare to plastic case.
  • IP54 Splash proof: Water drop and dust resistant. Please dry off digital caliper thoroughly before using, if your digital caliper dropped into the water by accident.

Package Include:

  • 1 x Digital Caliper
  • 1 x Protective Case
  • 3 x Button Cell
  • 1 x Screwdriver

item.description: Price: (as of – Details) 【Computer Safe & Backlight Digital Display Part】Heavy Duty circuit light tester with highly clear LCD digital blue backlight display screen, resolution to .1V voltage reading with high accuracy to ±0.2V, clear&visible digital readouts for day and night. Jastind test light draws much less current than the incandescent lamp, which is less likely ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $30.99 - $21.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:51:28 UTC – Details)



【Computer Safe & Backlight Digital Display Part】Heavy Duty circuit light tester with highly clear LCD digital blue backlight display screen, resolution to .1V voltage reading with high accuracy to ±0.2V, clear&visible digital readouts for day and night. Jastind test light draws much less current than the incandescent lamp, which is less likely to damage sensitive circuits.
【Quality Made Tester Body】Professional automotive circuit tester with premium acetate fiber body, allows for more toughness and durability. Sharp stainless steel probe for piercing wires effortlessly, also for hard to reach tight areas. Along with insulation protective rubber tip to against electric shock.
【Extended PU Spring & Large Alligator Clip】High quality 140 inch long enough PU spring wire offers more flexibility, lighter and more durable than normal cable wires, heat-insulation and oil resistance for daily use. Attach with large size alligator clip for easy one hand operation, also for convenient use and storage.
【100% Quality Guarantee】If you are looking for a durable circuit testing tool, this one is for you. We always stand behind our products, click “Add to Cart” with confidence today.

Price: $30.99 - $21.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:51:28 UTC – Details)
